typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	nucc_year_raw_file_suffix as string,
	data_year as string
}
source(output(
		Code as string,
		Grouping as string,
		Classification as string,
		Specialization as string,
		Definition as string,
		{Effective Date} as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		{Deactivation Date} as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		{Last Modified Date} as string,
		Notes as string,
		{Display Name} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:[(concat('nucc_taxonomy_',$nucc_year_raw_file_suffix,'.csv'))]) ~> ReadinRawNUCCTaxonomy
ReadinRawNUCCTaxonomy derive(year = $data_year) ~> AddYear
AddYear sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> LoadToSQL

parameters{
	sql_query as string,
	qc_id as integer,
	pipeline_name as string,
	pkey_column as string,
	table_name as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ($sql_query),
	format: 'query') ~> QCTable
QCTable derive(sql_query = $sql_query,
		qc_id = $qc_id,
		pipeline_name = $pipeline_name,
		pkey_column_values = split($pkey_column, ','),
		load_date = currentDate(),
		table_name = $table_name) ~> TestQuery
TestQuery aggregate(groupBy(qc_id,
		pipeline_name,
		table_name),
	count_of_rows = count(qc_id)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive(load_date = currentDate()) ~> AddLoadDate
TestQuery sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Code as string,
		Grouping as string,
		Classification as string,
		Specialization as string,
		Definition as string,
		{Effective Date} as string,
		{Deactivation Date} as string,
		{Last Modified Date} as string,
		Notes as string,
		{Display Name} as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['test_loop_sql_out.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
AddLoadDate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
TestQuery sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink3

parameters{
	l_table_name as string ('nucc_taxonomy')
}
source(output(
		code as string,
		grouping as string,
		classification as string,
		specialization as string,
		definition as string,
		notes as string,
		year as long,
		current_flag as long,
		{effective date} as string,
		{deactivation date} as string,
		{last modified date} as string,
		{display name} as string,
		{right_effective date} as string,
		{right_deactivation date} as string,
		{right_last modified date} as string,
		{right_display name} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		qc_id as integer,
		pipeline_name as string,
		pipeline_run_id as string,
		pipeline_trigger_time as timestamp,
		pkey_column_values as string,
		column_metric_error_values as string,
		table_name as string,
		alert_code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: '\nselect a.*, b.table_name, b.alert_code from [dqm].[qc_exception_detail] a\ninner join (select distinct qc_id,table_name, alert_code from [dqm].[qc_list]) b\non a.qc_id = b.qc_id',
	format: 'query') ~> source2
source2 filter(and(table_name == $l_table_name, alert_code == 'Y')) ~> Filter1
source1 derive(join_value = concat(code, toString(year))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, Filter1 join(join_value == pkey_column_values,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 filter(isNull(pkey_column_values)) ~> Filter2
Filter2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

parameters{
	sql_query as string,
	qc_id as integer,
	pipeline_name as string,
	pkey_column as string,
	final_sql_query as string,
	column_metric_name as string,
	alert_type as string,
	pipeline_run_id as string,
	pipeline_trigger_time as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ($final_sql_query),
	format: 'query') ~> QCTable
QCTable derive(qc_id = $qc_id,
		sql_query = $final_sql_query,
		pipeline_name = $pipeline_name,
		pipeline_run_id = $pipeline_run_id,
		pipeline_trigger_time = toTimestamp($pipeline_trigger_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSS')) ~> TestQuery
TestQuery sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		qc_id as integer,
		pipeline_name as string,
		pipeline_run_id as string,
		pipeline_trigger_time as timestamp,
		pkey_column_values as string,
		column_metric_error_values as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	pipeline_run_id as string,
	sql_query as string,
	input_SchemaName as string,
	input_TableName as string,
	pkey_column as string,
	pipeline_trigger_time as string,
	pipeline_name as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ($sql_query),
	format: 'query') ~> InputTable
source(output(
		qc_id as integer,
		pipeline_name as string,
		pipeline_run_id as string,
		pipeline_trigger_time as timestamp,
		pkey_column_values as string,
		column_metric_error_values as string,
		table_schema as string,
		table_name as string,
		sql_query as string,
		column_metric_name as string,
		alert_code as string,
		qc_type_code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("SELECT * FROM dqm.v_qc_exception_detail WHERE pipeline_run_id ='{$pipeline_run_id}' AND table_schema='{$input_SchemaName}' AND table_name = '{$input_TableName}'"),
	format: 'query') ~> QCExceptionDetail
MapDrifted1 derive(dqm_alert_code = 'P',
		pipeline_name = $pipeline_name,
		pipeline_run_id = $pipeline_run_id,
		pipeline_trigger_time = toTimestamp($pipeline_trigger_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSSSS')) ~> CreateTempAlertCode
QCExceptionDetail filter(alert_code=="R") ~> RedAlert
QCExceptionDetail filter(alert_code=="O") ~> OrangeAlert
QCExceptionDetail filter(alert_code=="Y") ~> YellowAlert
RedAlertTempColumn aggregate(groupBy(temp_alert_code,
		alert_code),
	temp_cnt = count(qc_id)) ~> RedAlertTable
OrangeAlert aggregate(groupBy(pkey_column_values,
		alert_code),
	temp_cnt = count(qc_id)) ~> OrangeAlertRecord
YellowAlert aggregate(groupBy(pkey_column_values,
		alert_code),
	temp_cnt = count(qc_id)) ~> YellowAlertRecord
RedAlertFlag, OrangeAlertRecordFinal lookup(MapDrifted1@pkey_column_values == OrangeAlertRecordFinal@pkey_column_values,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> OrangeAlertFlag
OrangeAlertFlag, YellowAlertRecordFinal lookup(MapDrifted1@pkey_column_values == YellowAlertRecordFinal@pkey_column_values,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> YellowAlertFlag
RedAlert derive(temp_alert_code = 'P') ~> RedAlertTempColumn
CreateTempAlertCode, RedAlertTableFinal lookup(dqm_alert_code == temp_alert_code,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> RedAlertFlag
YellowAlertFlag derive(final_alert_code = iifNull(iifNull(alert_code_red,alert_code_orange,alert_code_yellow),dqm_alert_code)) ~> CreateFinalAlertCode
CreateFinalAlertCode filter(final_alert_code=='P' || final_alert_code=='Y') ~> PassingRecord
InputTable derive(pkey_column_values = toString(byName('pkey_column_values'))) ~> MapDrifted1
RedAlertTable select(mapColumn(
		temp_alert_code,
		alert_code_red = alert_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RedAlertTableFinal
YellowAlertRecord select(mapColumn(
		pkey_column_values,
		alert_code_yellow = alert_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> YellowAlertRecordFinal
OrangeAlertRecord select(mapColumn(
		pkey_column_values,
		alert_code_orange = alert_code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OrangeAlertRecordFinal
PassingRecord sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
